name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Malware Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed PowerShell commands to download and execute additional malware, leading to unusual behavior across multiple systems.

parallel--9b490c82-ff97-4e43-b444-2371e7.name: Execute Initial Mitigations
parallel--9b490c82-ff97-4e43-b444-2371e7.description: Initiating multiple actions to contain the malware spread.

action--2c6ae552-f5e8-4c4f-8c79-dc86e5f0.name: Kill Malicious PowerShell Process
action--2c6ae552-f5e8-4c4f-8c79-dc86e5f0.description: Terminate any active PowerShell processes that might be involved in the attack.

action--e50e6ded-a57b-4293-8b7d-1c5f6123.name: Isolate Infected Hosts
action--e50e6ded-a57b-4293-8b7d-1c5f6123.description: Disconnect infected hosts from the network to prevent further spreading.

commands.command: if [ $(hostname) = 'host-22' ]; then nmcli device disconnect; fi

action--09db6c03-dbf3-4b30-9b90-f1b7f3f3.name: Perform Full System Scan
action--09db6c03-dbf3-4b30-9b90-f1b7f3f3.description: Run a comprehensive antivirus scan on the system.

action--3093c4a1-4ee1-418a-be45-69c8d29e.name: Check for Persistence Mechanisms
action--3093c4a1-4ee1-418a-be45-69c8d29e.description: Identify and remove any persistence mechanisms used by the malware.

action--f2ff2dde-c9e0-4b4e-b5aa-867341eb.description: Audit the network logs for any suspicious connections.
